About Club:
Kannada Sangha of RV College of Engineering is a vibrant student association dedicated to celebrating and preserving the rich heritage of Kannada language, literature, and culture. Guided by the vision to become a leading platform for promoting Kannada art and diversity within an engineering environment, the Sanghaorganizes a wide range of cultural, literary, and artistic events that reflect the essence of Karnataka's traditions.
The mission of Kannada Sangha extends beyond cultural promotion---it strives to uphold the integrity and prominence of the Kannada language while fostering inclusivity and respect for all other languages. By leveraging digital technologies, the Sangha actively works on translating academic and professional content into Kannada, thereby expanding its reach and relevance in modern contexts. Through its initiatives, Kannada Sangha nurtures creativity, socialresponsibility, and ethical values among students, contributing to their holistic development. It serves as a bridge between technology and tradition, inspiring young minds to stay rooted in their culture while embracing innovation and progress.
Head Of Club: Subramanya G M, Dr. Vikram N Bahaddur Desai, Dr. Rajalakshmi Mudubedre, Shiva Kumar
How to join: We do not have any exams or specific eligibility criteria. Anyone who is genuinely interested in contributing and being a part of our initiatives is welcome to join us during the registration drive held in the recruitment week.
